author: Lydia Smith
title: China Records Most Daily Coronavirus Cases Since March 5 As Cities in Province Bordering Russia Impose Lockdown Rules
description: Chinese cities including Harbin and Suifenhe have been tightening controls and bringing stricter quarantine rules in response to the growing regional threat of COVID-19.
content: China has reported more than 100 new coronavirus infections on one day, the highest daily number since March 5. A total of 108 new cases of COVID-19 were reported in the country's mainland on Sunday, overtaking the 99 infections on Saturday and the 46 reporte… [+2654 chars]
